name: VegasProAssistant
0:
”Alexa, open Vegas Pro Assistant”
”How can I record audio?”
”How do I render to a new track?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: vegas pro assistant
des: Vegas Pro Assistant helps you edit in Vegas Pro or Movie Studio teaching keyboard shortcuts, features, or giving simple troubleshooting tips. Vegas Pro assistant will answer common questions Vegas video editors may come across while editing. Now you can learn keyboard shortcuts while editing without breaking your workflow.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
